question: In which year, Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) was founded?
explanation: The Rashtriya Swayamsevak Sangh (RSS) is the world's largest voluntary non-governmental organisation, was founded by Keshav Baliram Hedgewar in 1925. The basic purpose of this organistaion to provide character training through Hindu discipline and to unite the Hindu community.
